channel.title: CVE Feed for afichet -- openexr-viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for afichet -- openexr-viewer

item.title: CVE-2023-50245|2023-12-11T22:39:19.059Z -- afichet -- openexr-viewer
item.description: OpenEXR-viewer is a viewer for OpenEXR files with detailed metadata probing. Versions prior to 0.6.1 have a memory overflow vulnerability. This issue is fixed in version 0.6.1.
